name: search_parts
description: Search for parts by text query. Returns candidate MPNs with vendor links.

name: get_kicad_assets
description: Get KiCad symbol & footprint for a manufacturer part number (MPN). Uses Digi-Key if logged in; else returns login_required.

name: add_symbol_to_project
description: Add/merge a KiCad symbol into the project library and return the lib ref.

symbol_kicad_sym.description: Full text content of .kicad_sym entry or file

name: add_footprint_to_project
description: Write a .kicad_mod to <project>/footprints.pretty and add to fp-lib-table.

name: generate_pinout_excel
description: Create an Excel with pin mapping (pin name, number, type, net suggestions) for the given MPN.
